entry.title: Hazardous Smoky Conditions to Last for Days as Canada Wildfires Rage
entry.content: Millions of Americans are being advised to stay indoors as the smoke continues to drift south.

entry.title: Pat Robertson, Influential Christian Broadcaster, Dies at 93
entry.content: He founded the Christian Broadcasting Network and played an influential role as evangelicals became more politically engaged.

entry.title: A Factory Exodus Is Hollowing Out Brazil's Industrial Heartland
entry.content: More than a dozen major companies from Ford to Sony have shut operations in Latin Americaâ€™s biggest economy, part of a deindustrialization that is among the fastest in the world.
